section.title: tax registrations creating new Tax Registration
section.para: To create a new Tax Registration, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Tax Registration, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Tax Authority associated with the Tax Registration Number.
Enter the appropriate Tax Registration Number for the specified Tax Authority.
The registration number is used by Tax Authorities to identify businesses and/or individuals. An Employer Identification Numbers (EIN) is an example of a Tax Registration Number.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Tax Registration, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Tax Registration and adds it to the master list of Tax Registrations.
